about_us.title: About Us
about_us.paragraph1: The Compagny of Hydromel is your ultimate hangout spot, where fun knows no bounds! Whether you're into epic gaming sessions, groovy tunes, creative masterpieces, or just want to chill with awesome folks, we've got a little something for everyone.
about_us.paragraph2: Cheers to new friendships and unforgettable experiences! üçª

join_our_discord.title: Join Our Discord Server
join_our_discord.description: Want to become a member of our awesome community? You can contact us on Discord!
